episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg shares strategies for creating impactful video content during the holidays. She emphasizes the importance of building connection and credibility through personal stories, which can lead to increased engagement and lead generation. Kim provides actionable tips on how agents can use their everyday experiences to enhance their social media presence and expand their sphere of influence.
